oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Name plate for Southern Cross of Honor pin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This name plate held once held the Southern Cross of Honor pin of Pvt. Lewis Cole, who served in Co. B, 55th Tenn. (Brown's) Inf., CSA. The United Daughters of the Confederacy gave the pins to Confederate veterans. Cole was born in 1836 in Benton County, Tenn. and died in 1925 in Paris, Tenn.
